Calculations on Na3OCl anti-perovskite:
***************************************

Na vacancy defect energy: 1.44 eV
Na vacancy migration barrier: 0.16 eV
Na interstitial defect energy: -6.33 eV

O vacancy defect energy: 21.52 eV
O vacancy migration barrier: 0.61 eV
O interstitial defect energy: -17.52 eV

Cl vacancy defect energy: 5.06 eV
Cl vacancy migration barrier: 1.19 eV
Cl interstitial defect energy: -4.4 eV

Na3OCl Schottky defect energy: -3.73 eV
NaCl partial Schottky defect energy: -1.59 eV
Na2O partial Schottky defect energy: -2.14 eV
Na Frenkel defect energy: -4.89 eV
O Frenkel defect energy: 3.99 eV
Cl Frenkel defect energy: 0.66 eV

Lattice energy of Na3OCl (from calculations): -34.63 eV
Lattice energy of NaCl (from calculations): -8.09 eV
Lattice energy of Na2O (from calculations): -26.54 eV
